summary: This document is an email from Ross Gow of ACUITY Reputation, sent on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, containing a statement denying allegations against her. It references changing stories involving public figures and specifically mentions an allegation against Alan Dershowitz, which is also denied. The statement asserts the claims are defamatory lies and reserves Maxwell's right to seek legal redress.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email contains a statement issued on her behalf denying all allegations as untrue and defamatory, and reserving her right to seek legal redress.

persons.name: Ross Gow
persons.context: Sender of the email, transmitting a quotable statement on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell and stating no further communication will be provided.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Referenced as someone against whom new salacious allegations are made (involving sexual relations), which he denies. The email characterizes these as obvious lies.

connections.description: Ross Gow is transmitting an official statement on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, acting as her representative.
Both are mentioned in the same set of allegations, with Maxwell's statement referencing new claims involving Dershowitz.

events.title: Issuance of denial statement
events.description: Ross Gow sends an email containing a quotable statement on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, denying all allegations as untrue and defamatory.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell, through her representative, issues a blanket denial of all allegations against her, calling them untrue and defamatory.
The statement references that allegations keep changing with 'new salacious details about public figures and world leaders'.
It specifically mentions a new allegation that Alan Dershowitz was involved in having sexual relations with an accuser, which Dershowitz denies.
Maxwell's representative states no further communication will be provided on the matter and reserves her right to seek legal redress for defamation.
